reviewText: Although this does not cover the earlier work of this great filmmaker, this is still a superb introduction to one of the world's great filmmakers. For anybody interested in visual cinema irrespective of the documentary fiction divide or even that between anthropology and the avant garde. This is essential and often simply astounding viewing. Included in this film are The Eye above the Well which was praised as a masterpiece by Jean Luc Comelli, and later work such as Face Value and Amsterdam Global Village, making this a very resonably priced package.
